prompts.create: Could you create a non-overlapping list of #N# existing animal species? Please separate the names with slashes and present them in a single line without numbering. ## Format name1 / name2 / name3 / ...
prompts.judge: Which one is #criteria# '#word1#' or '#word2#'? Answer only with '#word1#' or '#word2#'. ##Format #word1#/#word2#
prompts.mutate: Please list 10 existing animal species similar to, but slightly or significantly different from, '#word#'. Separate the names with slashes in a single, unnumbered line. ## Format name1 / name2 / name3 / ...
